Description: The Flight into Egypt: altered from Hercules Seghers; the Virgin riding a donkey led by Joseph on a hillside in the right foreground, a forest behind them and a landscape with a canal and hamlet in the central background; posthumous sixth state with all marks in the sky and the hills in the far distance burnished away. c. 1652 Etching, burin and drypoint
Curator's comments: For an impression of second state and comment see 1848,0911.31.
